data.text: I tan Yerusalɛn taan naxan luxi alo gbantana,
I ya bubuni gbo, i yi a fari sa han!
Amasɔtɔ ɛ sabatima nɛn yiifanna nun kɔmɛnna ma,
Amasɔtɔ Alatala mɔn ɛ xilima nɛn
N na ɛ rabeɲin nɛn waxatidi,
N na n yɛtagin luxun nɛn ɛ ma waxatidi,
Ala naxa, “N na a ligama nɛn to
N taan makantan sangansone findima nɛn gɛmɛ gbeeli faɲine ra,
Ɛ diine birin findima nɛn Alatalaa xarandiine ra,
A mato, n bata xabun da,
Yɛngɛ so se yo na rafala ɛ xili ma,
